gui.ascension.title: Skill Tree
gui.ascension.controls_hint: L-Click to Drag, Scroll to Zoom, M-Click to Toggle Skill
message.ascension.parent_locked: Parent locked! You need to learn: %s
message.ascension.criteria_failed: Criteria not met! Check the skill tree.
message.ascension.parent_locked_any: Parent locked! You must unlock at least one parent skill.
message.ascension.refund_points: [Ascension] Skill cost adjustment detected. %s skill points have been refunded.
skill.ascension.mining.desc: Improve efficiency in breaking and creating.
skill.ascension.fire_resistance.desc.2: Halves fire damage taken and extinguishes fire twice as fast.
skill.ascension.fire_infection.desc: Fight fire with fire! Ignites attackers when you are damaged while burning.
skill.ascension.thermal_dynamo.desc: Danger driven! +30% Movement Speed and +20% Attack Damage while burning.
skill.ascension.fire_res.desc: Ignore fire damage, just like a Nether native.
skill.ascension.rocket_boost.desc: Allows you to jump one extra time in mid-air.
skill.ascension.rocket_boost.desc.2: Allows you to jump two extra times in mid-air.
skill.ascension.charged_jump.desc: Sneak and hold Jump to charge. Release to launch.
skill.ascension.charged_jump.desc.2: Sneak and hold Jump to charge. Release to launch extremely far.
skill.ascension.adrenaline_burst.desc: Grants Absorption and Speed when taking heavy damage at full health.
skill.ascension.adrenaline_burst.desc.2: Grants massive Absorption and Speed when taking heavy damage at full health.
skill.ascension.excitement.desc: Rapidly consumes hunger to regenerate health when taking heavy damage.
skill.ascension.excitement.desc.2: Consumes hunger to regenerate massive amounts of health when taking heavy damage.
skill.ascension.hunger_constitution.desc: Grants more Absorption when hunger drops.
skill.ascension.hotpot_diner.desc: Eating cooked meat has a 10% chance to restore 3 hearts.
skill.ascension.hotpot_diner.desc.2: Eating cooked meat has a 20% chance to restore 3 hearts.
skill.ascension.hotpot_diner.desc.3: Eating cooked meat has a 30% chance to restore 3 hearts.
skill.ascension.sugar_master.desc: Eating Cake Slices or Pumpkin Pie grants 1.5 extra Saturation.
skill.ascension.sugar_master.desc.2: Eating Cake Slices or Pumpkin Pie grants 3.0 extra Saturation.
skill.ascension.sugar_master.desc.3: Eating Cake Slices or Pumpkin Pie grants 4.5 extra Saturation. If saturation overflows, it instantly heals health!
skill.ascension.hunger_tolerance.desc: Regenerate health as long as hunger is not zero.
skill.ascension.hunger_burst.desc: Grants Speed and Strength when starving (0 hunger).
skill.ascension.hunger_burst.desc.2: Grants Speed and Strength when starving (0 hunger).
skill.ascension.pocket_furnace.desc: Auto-smelts the item in the last hotbar slot. Low efficiency.
skill.ascension.pocket_furnace.desc.2: Auto-smelts the item in the last hotbar slot. Medium efficiency.
skill.ascension.lumberjack.desc: Slightly increases mining speed for logs and leaves.
skill.ascension.lumberjack.desc.2: Moderately increases mining speed for logs and leaves.
skill.ascension.lumberjack.desc.3: Significantly increases mining speed for logs and leaves.
skill.ascension.miner_frenzy.desc: Slightly increases mining speed for stone-type blocks.
skill.ascension.miner_frenzy.desc.2: Moderately increases mining speed for stone-type blocks.
skill.ascension.miner_frenzy.desc.3: Significantly increases mining speed for stone-type blocks.
skill.ascension.hephaestus_favor.desc: 35% chance to drop Quartz when mining Granite, Andesite, or Diorite.
skill.ascension.hephaestus_favor.desc.3: Increases drop chance to 70%, and adds a chance to drop Raw Iron.
skill.ascension.gold_panning.desc: Use a Shovel on Sand to consume 4 durability and find Gold Ingots (5% chance)! Chance affected by shovel tier and Fortune.
skill.ascension.gold_panning.desc.2: Use a Shovel on Sand to consume 4 durability and find Gold Ingots (7% chance)! Chance affected by shovel tier and Fortune.
skill.ascension.gold_panning.desc.3: Use a Shovel on Sand to consume 4 durability and find Gold Ingots (9% chance)! Chance affected by shovel tier and Fortune.
skill.ascension.gold_panning.desc.4: Use a Shovel on Sand to consume 4 durability and find Gold Ingots (11% chance)! Chance affected by shovel tier and Fortune.
skill.ascension.gold_panning.desc.5: Use a Shovel on Sand to consume 4 durability and find Gold Ingots (13% chance)! Chance affected by shovel tier and Fortune.
skill.ascension.gold_panning.desc.6: Use a Shovel on Sand to consume 4 durability and find Gold Ingots (15% chance)! Chance affected by shovel tier and Fortune.
skill.ascension.gold_panning.desc.7: Use a Shovel on Sand to consume 4 durability and find Gold Ingots (17% chance)! Chance affected by shovel tier and Fortune.
skill.ascension.gold_panning.desc.8: Use a Shovel on Sand to consume 4 durability and find Gold Ingots (19% chance)! Chance affected by shovel tier and Fortune.
skill.ascension.academic_miner.desc: Grants extra experience when mining ores.
skill.ascension.academic_miner.desc.2: Grants more extra experience when mining ores.
skill.ascension.swift_move.desc: You run faster. Speed increased by 13%.
skill.ascension.swift_move.desc.2: You run faster. Speed increased by 25%.
skill.ascension.swift_move.desc.3: You run faster. Speed increased by 40%.
skill.ascension.human_dynamo.desc: Kinetic conversion! Gain 5 XP for every 100 meters traveled.
skill.ascension.human_dynamo.desc.2: Gain 8 XP for every 100 meters traveled.
skill.ascension.human_dynamo.desc.3: Gain 11 XP for every 100 meters traveled.
